ResearchProjectDef.label: multi-analyzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build multi-analyzers which increase research speed and allow higher-level research projects.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->unlocked the trans-spectrum secrets of the universe

ResearchProjectDef.label: vitals monitor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build vitals monitors which improve medical outcomes when placed next to hospital beds.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->struggled in an overcrowded hospital and vowed to work for change
subject_story->nursed a glassworld survivor back to health
subject_story->monitored the isolation ward remotely, sending mechanoids in for treatments

ResearchProjectDef.label: fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build fabrication benches, capable of high-tech projects ranging from component assembly to power armor construction.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You now have the technology to build a fabrication bench - but it also requires some advanced components to get started. You can collect advanced components several ways:

 -All outlander settlements sell advanced components. Send a caravan to buy some.
 -Some visiting traders sell advanced components. Invite or wait for them.
 -Some quests are rewarded with advanced components.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->spent many years crafting advanced components, to make fabrication benches to make more advanced components
subject_story->traded everything to build a single fabrication bench
subject_story->constructed technological marvels which the feral villagers worshipped as magical

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Fabricate advanced components from standard components and other materials.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->traded advanced components to desperate rimworlders
subject_story->learned the secrets of fabricating advanced components and died without revealing them
subject_story->balked at the extreme cost of crafting advanced components and chose a simpler lifestyle

ResearchProjectDef.label: cryptosleep casket
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct cryptosleep caskets, which can put living beings in a state of indefinite suspended animation.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->intended to test a prototype cryptosleep casket and woke a generation later, alone
subject_story->sentenced the system's worst criminal to indefinite cryptosleep rather than death
subject_story->used a cryptosleep capsule to suspend the terminally ill, so they could see their children once they'd grown up

ResearchProjectDef.label: recon armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft recon armor, a light powered armor suit used by scout troops who need protection on the move. Note that these also require advanced components.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->led the rebel scouts against the Imperial forces, until captured
subject_story->crafted powered armor light and resilient enough for the hammer-users to close with the enemy
subject_story->intended recon armor more for hunters than soldiers. It sold well, regardless

ResearchProjectDef.label: marine armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build marine armor, a general-use powered armor suit used by high-tech shock troops. Note that these also require advanced components.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->was employed by the shock troops to maintain their armor
subject_story->tested the armor by walking, unarmed, through a hostile feral village without receiving a scratch
subject_story->intended the armor as protection against the planet's hostile weather, but it worked well against the pirates too

ResearchProjectDef.label: pulse-charged munitions
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build weapons which fire pulse-charged munitions for extra damage. Note that these also require advanced components.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->studied glitterworld monorails and modified the tech for weapons
subject_story->killed a mechanical crawler by kiting it with a charge lance
subject_story->learned how to imbue rifle ammunition with retained charge, heavily increasing its lethality

ResearchProjectDef.label: bionic replacements
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build high-tech bionic body parts to replace lost limbs and eyes. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->worked primarily with disfigured soldiers, crafting bespoke bionic facial elements so they could return to their loved ones
subject_story->studied slowed vids of human motion to better craft bionic prosthetics
subject_story->was volunteered to have the various prototype bionics implanted, ending up as more machine than man

ResearchProjectDef.label: uranium slug turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor-penetrating uranium slug turret. It fires uranium slugs which tear through plasteel like paper, but it's less effective at close range.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->led the clean-up after the war, collecting spent radioactive uranium slugs from the front line
subject_story->saw a turret shoot straight through an assault mechanoid and needed to understand how
subject_story->researched the effects of ammunition density on armor

ResearchProjectDef.label: rocketswarm launcher
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce rocketswarm launchers, single-burst turrets which can devastate a wide area at a key moment in battle.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->testified about the use of rocketswarm launchers against civilian targets
subject_story->constructed last-ditch defenses, including traps and launchers, in case the settlement was ever threatened
subject_story->started by constructing primitive rockets to reach space, but the high failure rate led to them being repurposed as weapons
